Mimo ograje s ceste
04 Nov 2019, 19:40 by Danijel Cek

Prehitra vožnja na mokri cesti v izredno nevarnem ovinku je v nedeljo popoldne ohromila promet na glavni cesti od Staroda proti Kozini. Mladi hrvaški voznik je z avtom zdrsnil s ceste in končal 15 metrov pod cesto v drevesih in grmovju.



Trije mladi Hrvati so z avtom vred končali 15 metrov pod cesto.  Foto: PGD Ilirska Bistrica

RAČICE > Nesreča se je zgodila v nedeljo popoldne, nekaj minut po četrti uri, ko se je 24-letni hrvaški voznik z avtom vozil od Staroda proti Kozini. Mladi voznik očitno ne pozna nevarnega ovinka nad vasjo Račice in je na mokri cesti pripeljal vanj s previsoko hitrostjo, zaradi česar je zdrsnil s ceste ter pri tem “našel” edino luknjo med brežino in odbojno ograjo.
Avto, v katerem sta bili poleg voznika njegovi sestri, je padel čez rob ceste na strmo brežino in nadaljeval še nekaj metrov, dokler se približno 15 metrov pod cesto ni ustavili v drevesih in grmičevju. Dva od treh potnikov v avtu sta se sama rešila iz razbite pločevine in poklicala na pomoč, tretjemu pa so pomagali podgrajski in bistriški gasilci, ki so prihiteli na kraj nesreče.
Avto so privezali, da ne bi zdrsnil še niže, in ponesrečencem nudili pomoč do prihoda bistriških reševalcev. Ti so dva oskrbeli kar na kraju, tretjega pa odpeljali v izolsko bolnišnico. Po neuradnih podatkih naj bi se vsi trije le laže poškodovali.
Zaradi reševanja ponesrečencev in vlečenja razbitega avta iz prepada je bil promet na glavni cesti eno uro zaprt v obe smeri, kasneje pa je bil še slabo uro izmeničen. Mladi voznik je bil med vožnjo trezen, zaradi nesreče pa si je prislužil kazen.

Past the fence off the road
04 Nov 2019, 18:40 by Danijel Cek

Speeding on a wet road in an extremely dangerous bend on Sunday afternoon crippled traffic on the main road from Starod to Kozina. A young Croatian driver slid off the road and ended 15 meters below the road in trees and bushes.



Three young Croats finished the car 15 meters below the road. Photo: PGD Ilirska Bistrica

CRIMES> The accident happened Sunday afternoon, minutes after four o'clock, when a 24-year-old Croatian driver was driving from Starod to Kozina by car. The young driver apparently did not know the dangerous bend over the village of Račice and, at a wet road, drove into it at too high a speed, causing him to slip off the road, finding the only hole between the slope and the fence.
The car in which his sisters were next to the driver fell over the side of the road onto a steep slope and continued for a few more meters until about 15 meters below the road stopped in trees and shrubs. Two of the three occupants of the car escaped from the broken sheet metal and called for help, while the third was assisted by suburban and Bistrica firefighters arriving at the scene.
They moored the car so that it would not slip further, and assisted the victims until the arrival of the ambulance workers from Bistrica. The two were taken to the scene and taken to the hospital in Izola. According to unofficial data, all three are expected to be slightly injured.
Due to the rescue of the injured people and pulling the broken car out of the abyss, traffic on the main road was closed for one hour in both directions, and later a bad hour was alternated. The young driver was sober while driving and earned a fine.
